ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are you asking if they are cute or if there are girls? lol. My sister got me into playing EQ and I know quite a few women who play. My mother even plays.
ygData.messageBody:
> Me and my friend were having a discussion the other night while he
> was playing eq, he was talking to his eq wife, and i was messing
> with him, and if brought up the questions of, are there really girls
> that play eq, or are the all guys. Then he asked me, if there are
> girls that play, are they cute? Just curious.
>
Are you asking if they are cute or if there are girls? lol.
My sister got me into playing EQ and I know quite a few women who play. My
mother even plays.
So to the first part of the question, yes, girls do play EQ. I saw some
pictures on the tribunal boards of some of the girls who play EQ so there
are some cute ones. Assuming those are actually their real photos.
luv,
-Su
